Bread Posted by SNCS on 05/28/2012
Great find
We were looking for a quick bite early on Saturday and came across"BREAD". We were promptly served and the food and atmosphere were excellent. Had breaded baked eggplant for a starter, an aged salami bread, my wife fresh linguini with asparagus and pesto, and the kids split spinach ravioli. We all enjoyed our food, the bread and olive oil was good too! Bread Posted by zooey on 10/03/2011
waited forever - food disappointing
was looking for a new place and ordered dinner from bread on a whim - delivery took over an hour and the food was a huge disappointment. my boyfriend had a chicken sandwich . . . which didn't have much chicken in it at all. was pressed within an in of its life and looked like cardboard. I had a salad which was OK, but not worth an hour. won't be ordering from here again. Bread Posted by giovanni on 05/12/2011
I love this place
I just got here from Italy and I been having a hard time finding a good Italian place. There are many Italian restaurant and some are good but usually overpriced. Bread made me feel at home, simple food ( the pesto is great!) and the stuff was friendly and full of smiles. I dont miss Rome now. Bread Posted by alexiscollidge on 04/01/2011
Great Meatballs!
I ordered from Bread tonight with my girlfriend. The meatballs were so delicious! WE loved it. Bread Posted by amanda on 03/20/2011
Not the best experience
This place had a nice atmosphere and decent menu with decent prices. We waited at the back bar for our table and drank watery sangria. It was so busy that the servers and hostess seemed confused and inattentive. I was told that the kitchen was too busy to make my omelet with egg whites instead of eggs. While I was irritated by that, the food came quickly and was not bad. Bread Posted by nolitaeater on 01/29/2011
I love bread!
I eat here or order delivery at least once a week. the salads and soup are delicious and fresh. the staff is always super nice. im a big fan and supporter! Bread Posted by maximiliano on 01/18/2011
falso cibo italiano
i ordered from bread earlier tonight with my girlfriend...it take over an hour..i had 2 pastas and a sanwich for 38 $...opened the brown paper bag..ready to eat my meal...which was cold...the pesto sauce in the pasta was the worst creamy pesto i ever had..im a native italian so i know. over priced, smalll portians....bad service. ciao
